name: Jones and Bones
description:
Jones has braved many a dark and dangerous dungeon in search of fortune and treasure, and his adventures have led him to a cursed Egyptian tomb. Deadly traps and malicious forces will not deter him, as Jones has claimed he will adventure until the day that he dies... and perhaps even after that?

To Win :

 You need to find the five pharaoh head, each head will give you more attack power and boost your defense. Be fast, the mummy's number and strenght increase with time. 

Controls : 

To move the character : W, A, S, D

To Attack : Point in the direction you want to attack and Right Clic

Teams: 

Jérémie Auclair / 3D Artist

Alexandre Bonin / 3D Artist

Dave Plante Marquis / 3D Artist

Jean-Christophe Morin / Prog

Wiliam Lebeuf / Sound Designer

Josh Wilson / 3D Artist
